data.text: @TOPublicHealth There you have it.  lets get back to our lives and start living again.  Drop all the restrictions and lets just live again.  stats are stats.

2/2: #VaxAndRead continues this week at 12 @torontolibrary branches. Come borrow a book and get your 1st, 2nd, 3rd or children's dose of the #COVID19 vaccine today if you haven't already. Walk-ins welcome! No OHIP card needed. Find a clinic near you: https://t.co/CjqW6SGhnz
